name: Out-of-bounds Write
description: The product writes data past the end
column5: or before the beginning

name: Cross-site Scripting
description: The product does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes user-controllable input before it is placed in output that is used as a web page that is served to other users.

name: SQL Injection
description: The product constructs all or part of an SQL command using externally-influenced input from an upstream component
column5: but it does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes special elements that could modify the intended SQL command when it is sent to a downstream component.

name: Use After Free
description: Referencing memory after it has been freed can cause a program to crash
column5: use unexpected values

name: OS Command Injection
description: The product constructs all or part of an OS command using externally-influenced input from an upstream component
column5: but it does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes special elements that could modify the intended OS command when it is sent to a downstream component.

name: Improper Input Validation
description: The product receives input or data
column5: but it does not validate or incorrectly validates that the input has the properties that are required to process the data safely and correctly.

name: Out-of-bounds Read
description: The product reads data past the end
column5: or before the beginning

name: Path Traversal
description: The product uses external input to construct a pathname that is intended to identify a file or directory that is located underneath a restricted parent directory
column5: but the product does not properly neutralize special elements within the pathname that can cause the pathname to resolve to a location that is outside of the restricted directory.

name: CSRF
description: The web application does not
column5: or can not
column8: consistent request was intentionally provided by the user who submitted the request.

name: Unrestricted Upload of File
description: The product allows the attacker to upload or transfer files of dangerous types that can be automatically processed within the product's environment.

name: Missing Authorization
description: The product does not perform an authorization check when an actor attempts to access a resource or perform an action.

name: NULL Pointer Dereference
description: A NULL pointer dereference occurs when the application dereferences a pointer that it expects to be valid
column5: but is NULL
column6: typically causing a crash or exit.

name: Improper Authentication
description: When an actor claims to have a given identity
column5: the product does not prove or insufficiently proves that the claim is correct.

name: Integer Overflow or Wraparound
description: The product performs a calculation that can produce an integer overflow or wraparound
column5: when the logic assumes that the resulting value will always be larger than the original value. This can introduce other weaknesses when the calculation is used for resource management or execution control.

name: Deserialization of Untrusted Data
description: The product deserializes untrusted data without sufficiently verifying that the resulting data will be valid.

name: Command Injection
description: The product constructs all or part of a command using externally-influenced input from an upstream component
column5: but it does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes special elements that could modify the intended command when it is sent to a downstream component.

name: Memory Buffer Boundary Issue
description: The product performs operations on a memory buffer
column5: but it can read from or write to a memory location that is outside of the intended boundary of the buffer.

name: Use of Hard-coded Credentials
description: The product contains hard-coded credentials
column5: such as a password or cryptographic key
column6: which it uses for its own inbound authentication

name: SSRF
description: The web server receives a URL or similar request from an upstream component and retrieves the contents of this URL
column5: but it does not sufficiently ensure that the request is being sent to the expected destination.

name: Missing Authentication
description: The product does not perform any authentication for functionality that requires a provable user identity or consumes a significant amount of resources.

name: Race Condition
description: The product contains a code sequence that can run concurrently with other code
column5: and the code sequence requires temporary
column6: exclusive access to a shared resource
column7: but a timing window exists in which the shared resource can be modified by another code sequence that is operating concurrently.

name: Improper Privilege Management
description: The product does not properly assign
column5: modify
column7: or check privileges for an actor
column8: creating an unintended sphere of control for that actor.

name: Code Injection
description: The product constructs all or part of a code segment using externally-influenced input from an upstream component
column5: but it does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes special elements that could modify the syntax or behavior of the intended code segment.

name: Incorrect Authorization
description: The product performs an authorization check when an actor attempts to access a resource or perform an action
column5: but it does not correctly perform the check. This allows attackers to bypass intended access restrictions.

name: Incorrect Default Permissions
description: During installation
column5: installed file permissions are set to allow anyone to modify those files.
